se.kth.ict.docaid.algorithms.keywords

Class KeywordExtractor

  • java.lang.Object
    • se.kth.ict.docaid.algorithms.keywords.KeywordExtractor

  • public class KeywordExtractor
extends java.lang.Object
    Guesses keywords from an input string, based on the frequency of the words.
    See Also:
    http://lucene.apache.org/

                                  throws java.io.IOException
        Stemmize the given term.
        Parameters:
        term - The term to stem.
        Returns:
        The stem of the given term.

      • find

        private static <T> T find(java.util.Collection<T> collection,
         T example)
        Tries to find the given example within the given collection. If it hasn't been found, the example is automatically added in the collection and is then returned.
        Parameters:
        collection - The collection to search into.
        example - The example to search.
        Returns:
        The existing element if it has been found, the given example otherwise.

      • guessFromString

        public static java.util.ArrayList<Keyword> guessFromString(java.lang.String input)
                                                    throws java.io.IOException
        Guesses keywords from given input string.
        Parameters:
        input - The input string.
        Returns:
        A set of potential keywords. The first keyword is the most frequent one, the last the least frequent.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If an I/O error occured.
